allLanguages._context: Label for dropdown to select a language

allResources._context: Label for dropdown to select resources

header._context: The page title header at the top of the page

allLanguages._context: Label for dropdown to select a language

allResources._context: Label for dropdown to select resource types

nameHeader._context: The table header for the name column

typeHeader._context: The table header for the resource type column

languageHeader._context: The table header for the resource language column

statusHeader._context: The table header for the resource status column

publishedHeader._context: The table header for the resource published column

none._context: Label for the None resource status

previous._context: Button label to navigate to the previous page in the table

next._context: Button label to navigate to the next page in the table

pageNumber._context: Indicates the user's current page number among total number of pages

perPage._context: Number per page, indicates how many records are shown

name._context: The label for the user name

email._context: The label for the user's email

role._context: The label for the users's role

company._context: The label for the company the user belongs to

status._context: The label for whether the user email is verified

dashboard._context: The label for the dashboard link

resources._context: The label for the resources link

reporting._context: The label for the reporting link

projects._context: The label for the projects link

users._context: The label for the users link
